n: There's no such thing as a paradox
r: We have to go back, back to the future!

p.c:
There's no such thing as a
ParadoX!
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0001.png[/img]

A young man stands in the parking lot of the TriPines Mall, it just so happens today, October 26th 2022, was the day this young man's good friend was to show him a time machine, made out of a car. Unfortunately, said showcase has been halted with the presence of terrorists, who have shot this young man's good friend in the back for stealing their plutonium, which this young man's good friend was using to fuel his time machine. It is only now, in this moment of tremendous intensity, that this young man will finally get a name!

What will the name of this young man be?

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0002.gif[/img]

The young man seems insulted you'd be joking at a time like this, or maybe the young man is just panicking, it's hard to tell.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0003.gif[/img]

The young man calls it good enough.

Will will you do?

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0004.png[/img]

Haha yes very funny just like that bedtime story about the old gods except YOU ARE BEING SHOT AT BY TERRORISTS NOW IS NOT THE TIME!

p.c: Harty: Use the car door as a shield
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0005.png[/img]

THIS CAR IS A DELOREAN, THEIR DOORS OPEN UPWARDS LIKE A SHITTY UFO. THIS IS SUCH A STUPID SHEILD, FUCK.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0006.png[/img]

Finally! A good idea! You scramble into the car as bullets go whizzing past your head. You still think this is batshit crazy, it's gotta be a dream or something right? RIGHT?

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0007.png[/img]

You floor it, but you have a feeling that these guys aren't gonna give up so easily, you doubt they'd let up unless you wrapped space time around them, Lalonde you wish you had something that could do that.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0008.png[/img]
SPEED - 68 MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:01
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57
It's a little hard to do that when focusing on driving but you'll do your best. Honestly you don't know what half of this stuff even does, there's so many dials and displays that the doc didn't even bother explaining. You can at least decipher the speed (you think), and the doc did say something about the middle terminal. "[color=#804040]Where you are, where you're going, where you've been[/color]" is what you remember off the top of your head. He showed you how to enter a date, then he rambled on about the 20th of November 1991, the day he apparently got the time gear. That date sounded significant to you for another reason, but you didn't have time to think about it before you heard gun fire.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0009.png[/img]
SPEED - 74 MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:01
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57
Right the Time Gear! "[color=#804040]The thing that makes time travel possible Harty![/color]" Honestly you have no idea how doc got his hands on a sburban artifact, maybe it was grant money? But then why would he hold on to it for over 30 years? YOU DON'T HAVE TIME TO BE THINKING ABOUT THIS RIGHT NOW!

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0010.png[/img]
SPEED - 83 MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:02
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57
YOU'RE GOING AS FAST AS YOU CAN, COME ON YOU HUNK OF JUNK LET'S SEE IF YOU CAN-...

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0011.png[/img]
SPEED - 85 MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:02
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57
Wait a second...

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0012.png[/img]
SPEED - 87 MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:02
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57
Is that...?

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0013.gif[/img]
SPEED - [color=#ff0000]88[/color] MPH
OCT 26 2022 1:02
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 0:57

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0014.png[/img]
SPEED - 7 MPH
NOV 20 1991 20:00
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 1:02
You brace yourself and come to a stop in the middle of what looks like a field

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0015.png[/img]
SPEED - 0 MPH
NOV 20 1991 20:00
NOV 20 1991 20:00
OCT 26 2022 1:02
Okay, calm down, keep calm, deep breaths Harty deep breaths...

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0016.png[/img]

You okay, car's okay, everything's okay, you're just... in 1991. That's fine, no big deal, 1991, you just have to... find a way back... from 19... 91...

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0017.png[/img]

Or more specifically you guess, November the 20th 1991. 

That date still rings a bell in your head but you really can't recall anything on this specific day. Besides the fact this is the date the Doc got his time gear, you mean. Maybe whatever's bugging you has something to do with-...

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0018.png[/img]

Wait

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0019.png[/img]

Fuck

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0020.png[/img]

You hate this. so much.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0021.png[/img]

First, your dad's car breaks down so you can't go on your date, then, you get up at half an hour past midnight to see Doc's cool new invention, only for him to be [i]shot[/i] right in front of your eyes, [i]then[/i] you end up in 1991, which, a) You're stuck in until you can figure out how to get this stupid DeLorean time hopping again, b) happens to be the date which Doc got his shitty time gear, the same one he failed to mention came from c) THE HEROIC DEATH OF A TIME GOD THAT RANDOMLY APPEARED IN SADE CITY IN 199-

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0022.png[/img]

Uh oh

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0023.png[/img]

Looks like you aren't the first one here, but... if this is when Doc got the time gear, then he's gotta be around here somewhere right?

What will you do?

p.c: Harty: Look around without getting out
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0024.png[/img]

Looks like the SCPD is being spread thin, not unreasonable considering this... event... seems to have happened in the middle of a major intersection. That being said, this side of the crime scene seems to be particularly sparse. The only two officers here are a human cop, who seems particularly bored of her job, and a troll cop, who seems way to enthusiastic about nothing in particular. Quite a particular duo.

p.c: Harty: Ask a spectator what's going on
p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0025.png[/img]
[color=#e00707]SPECTATOR: idk man, heard there was a bang out here and wha'd'ya know, shit starts glowing as gold as scrooge mcduck's bin in a full moon. it was like day light here for a while dude it was wild. SPECTATOR: btw nice delorean, back to the future right? loved those movies as a kid[/color]

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0026.png[/img]

You get out of your car and head over to the near by tree, hoping to get a vantage point on the situation.

[img]https://file.garden/X1htvgJ0DEp_tp-Z/NoParadox/0027.png[/img]

Unfortunately you are horrible at climbing, you should probably remember that.
